data.title: Real Luxury: Ferrari Lamborghini Car Rental
data.meta_description: Real Luxury is based in Tuscany and offers Ferrari & Lamborghini sports car rental, supercar driving tours & helicopter tours in Italy & French Riviera.
data.meta_site_name: The Luxe Voyager: Luxury Travel | Luxury Vacations & Holidays
data.text:
TOUR HIGHLIGHTS:

Real Luxury is a sports car rental company & supercar driving tour operator located in Chianti, Tuscany with operations in Italy, France & Switzerland.

Rent your Ferrari, Lamborghini, Maserati, Mclaren, Porsche, Mercedes, BMW, Bentley in Italy, France, Switzerland.

We offer custom Ferrari driving tours around Italy and incentive experience for companies. On board of your dream car you will travel across Italy to discover : breathtaking scenery, hidden places, typical Italian designer boutiques, historic wineries, beautiful villas and medieval castles where relive the history and charm of Italy.

We provide exclusive helicopter tours & transfer around Italy.

Real Luxury offers exclusive personal concierge services for VIPs such as: theater and opera tickets, access to exclusive clubs, last minute bookings for restaurants, movie previews, movie shows, front row football tickets and private car transport.

You can drive with us in a real Formula 1 or Formula 3 car, on the track with a professional Ferrari / Lamborghini instructor.

EXCLUSIVE LUXE VOYAGER VIP BENEFITS & BEST PRICE

We negotiate rates & benefits for our clients directly with the hotels’ senior management. Our rates match or in many cases are lower than the best online rate for the property. Our clients also enjoy a suite of extra VIP privileges and recognition while staying at a partner hotel.

Complimentary room upgrade on arrival.

Daily complimentary buffet breakfast for two.

Up to $100 dining or spa credit per stay, and or in-house dining / spa discounts.

Welcome amenities (wine/chocolates/fruit) and card from the GM.

Complimentary private airport transfers.

Complimentary roll-away bed if required.

Early check-in and late check-out.

Complimentary Wi-Fi.

Enhanced recognition through VIP status at all touch points in the guest experience.

A complete or partial suite of VIP benefits will be offered, subject to the property T&C, including availability, category of room & length of stay.

DRIVING TOURS:

Supercar Tours

We organize bespoke supercar tours throughout Italy. Our staff will take care of every detail of the trip, offering unique experiences in exclusive locations. Our packages and our proposals can be modified and integrated depending on clients’ needs in order to prepare a high quality tailor-made product. Full attention to every detail will make it a unique travel experience that can be further enriched by professional photos and videos of your trip: this will transform every moment and emotion into indelible memories.

Vintage Car Tours

It is difficult to find a better way to enjoy Italy’s splendors than travelling on board of a vintage car. Vintage car tours are the ideal choice for a few hours trip or a journey of a day, in order to discover the most beautiful locations in Italy. Our tours are designed to provide clients with an impeccable and unforgettable service. The availability of a wide range of vintage cars will satisfy the demands of the most delicate palates. Any logistical and organizational need will be discussed and arranged with the client in order to fully meet his or her expectations. Our timeless vintage cars (chauffeur included), include cars of the ‘50s the iconic Fiat 500, of the ‘60s, the Alfa Romeo, and Fiat Spiders of the ‘70s and ‘80s to enjoy breathtaking summer views of the Italian landscape. Tailor-made for families, friends or company incentives, these tours are impeccably conceived in order to offer a once-in-a-lifetime journey.

Drive on a Circuit

The passion for cars goes from the street to the race track in order to improve driving skills and have fun in complete safety. Our clients can reserve a dedicated race track for a day (or half a day) or take part in our activities. Our team of professional pilots will coordinate all the activities, which will take place in maximum safety and organization.

Tour of the Italian Alps

The “Tour of the Italian Alps” in eight days, aims to promote the excellencies and the uniqueness of the Italian beauties and traditions under a completely new perspective. Guests will drive powerful and luxurious SUVs from the wild and isolated areas in the mountains to the outstanding beauties of the uncontaminated small villages. From the direct contact with centuries long farmers’ traditions to a four day supercars driving experience in the magnificent roads of the north of Italy for an impressive driving journey of 1,000 km (circa 620 miles). The tour will be simply unforgettable thanks also to the impeccable, tailor made services offered to all guests.

Luxury Car Rental

Our car rental service is calibrated to clients’ needs. The offer ranges from the Abarth 500 to the powerful supercars like Maserati, Ferrari and Lamborghini to the sedans and SUVs. We can provide any kind of car throughout Italy thanks to our extensive network of suppliers.

Real Luxury is a luxury and sports car rental company located in Italy between Siena and Florence, the headquarter is in the heart of Chianti, a famous area for the production of Chianti Classico red wine, full of breathtaking landscapes, warm people and great food. An ideal place to be lived in and admired in all its beauty on board of one of our Top Cars. The founding members of Real Luxury have been operating for years with passion and success in the luxury car rental sector in Italy, the French Riviera, Switzerland and in the international Top Car, Ferrari Tour and Incentive rental scene. Real Luxury is not limited to just renting luxury sports cars, but allows you to experience a trip on board the latest models of Ferrari and Lamborghini, indisputable symbols of Made in Italy in the world.

We offer custom Ferrari driving tours around Italy and incentive experience for companies. This product is ideal and specific for: team building activities, award trips, awarding the best sellers, best customers of the year, top managers and VIP clients. Real Luxury also offers helicopter tours and exclusive personal concierge services for VIPs such as: theater and opera tickets, access to exclusive clubs and to the ‘red carpet’ or front row at Milan fashion week, last minute bookings for Michelin restaurants, movie previews, movie shows, front row football tickets and private car transport. You can also drive with us in a real Formula 1 or Formula 3 car, on the track with a professional Ferrari or Lamborghini instructor.
